channel.title: Races 100s on Slow Runners of Salem
channel.description: Recent content in Races 100s on Slow Runners of Salem

item.title: Race Schedule
item.description:
Looking for a challenge or an opportunity to run in new places? Then join our Slow Runners of Salem team. The schedule of races we plan on attending changes sometimes so be sure to check back from time-to-time.

Interested in a race that’s not listed? Let us know on our Telegram group chat.

2025 Race Schedule (Being updated)

  • Race to Save the Harvest
    • Date: June 28, 2025
    • Location: Minto Brown Park, Salem, OR
    • Race length: 5K (Or 3K)
    • Team Sign-up Link
  • Portland Half-Marathon
    • Date: October 5, 2025
    • Location: Portland’s Waterfront Park
    • Race length: Half-marathon [13.1 miles] (Or Marathon and 10K)
    • Team Sign-up Link
